description.dutch: Stijg op en land 5 keer in dezelfde speedriding-run (DLC Extreme-pack vereist).
description.finnish: Nouse ilmaan ja laskeudu viisi kertaa saman speed riding -suorituksen aikana (Extreme Pack -lisäosa vaaditaan)
description.norwegian: Ta av og land 5 ganger i samme Speed Riding-run (Extreme Pack-nedlastingen kreves)
description.swedish: Lyft och landa 5 gånger under samma åk i speed riding (DLC:t Extreme Pack krävs)
description.brazilian: Levante voo e aterrisse 5 vezes na mesma descida de speed riding (DLC necessário: Pacote Extremo)

description.english: Fly for 5 minutes with the Rocket Wingsuit (Extreme Pack DLC required)
description.german: Fliege 5 Minuten mit dem Raketen-Wingsuit (DLC „Extreme Pack“ erforderlich)
description.french: Voler 5 minutes avec la Rocket Wingsuit (DLC Extreme Pack nécessaire)
description.italian: Vola per 5 minuti con la rocket wing (è richiesto il DLC Extreme Pack)
description.koreana: 로켓 윙수트를 입고 5분간 비행(익스트림 팩 DLC 필요)
description.spanish: Vuela durante 5 minutos con el traje de alas propulsoras (requiere el Pack Extremo).
description.schinese: 用火箭飞鼠装飞行 5 分钟（需要《Extreme》包 DLC）
description.tchinese: 用火箭飛鼠裝飛行 5 分鐘（需要《Extreme》包 DLC）
description.russian: Пролети 5 минут в реактивном вингсьюте (Требуется DLC — набор «Экстрим».)
description.japanese: Rocketウィングスーツで5分間飛ぶ（DLCエクストリームパックが必要）
description.polish: 5 minut lotu wingsuitowego w kostiumie odrzutowym (wymagany dodatek „Pakiet ekstremalny”)
description.danish: Flyv i fem minutter med et rocket wingsuit (kræver Extreme Pack-DLC)
description.dutch: Vlieg 5 minuten met de rocketwingsuit (DLC Extreme-pack vereist).
description.finnish: Lennä rocket wingsuitilla 5 minuuttia (Extreme Pack -lisäosa vaaditaan)
description.norwegian: Fly i 5 minutter med Rocket Wingsuit (Extreme Pack-nedlastingen kreves)
description.swedish: Flyg i 5 minuter med Rocket Wingsuit (DLC:t Extreme Pack krävs)
description.brazilian: Voe por 5 minutos com rocket wingsuit (DLC necessário: Pacote Extremo)

displayName.english: I can see my house from up there
displayName.german: Von hier oben kann man mein Haus sehen
displayName.italian: Da lassù si vede casa mia
displayName.spanish: Desde aquí arriba se ve mi casa
displayName.schinese: 从这上面可以看到我家
displayName.tchinese: 從這上面可以看到我家
displayName.danish: Jeg kan se mit hus herfra
displayName.dutch: Ik zie mijn huis van daar!
displayName.norwegian: Jeg kan se huset mitt der oppe fra
displayName.brazilian: Dá pra ver a minha casa lá de cima!

description.english: Safely land after jumping from all the 7 Base Jump Spots in Alaska (Extreme Pack DLC required)
description.german: Springe von allen 7 Base-Jumping-Orten in Alaska und lande sicher (DLC „Extreme Pack“ erforderlich)
description.french: Atterrir en toute sécurité après avoir sauté des 7 spots de Base Jump d'Alaska (DLC Extreme Pack nécessaire)
description.italian: Atterra in sicurezza dopo aver saltato da tutte e 7 le zone di Base jumping in Alaska (è richiesto il DLC Extreme Pack)
description.koreana: 알라스카의 7개 베이스 점프 모두에서 점프 후 안전하게 착지(익스트림 팩 DLC 필요)
description.spanish: Aterriza de forma segura después de saltar desde los 7 puntos de salto base de Alaska (requiere el Pack Extremo).
description.schinese: 在阿拉斯加 7 个定点跳伞位置中全都安全着陆（需要《Extreme》包 DLC）
description.tchinese: 在阿拉斯加 7 個定點跳傘位置中全都安全著陸（需要《Extreme》包 DLC）
description.russian: Выполни успешные прыжки с 7 точек для бейсджампинга на Аляске (Требуется DLC — набор «Экстрим».)
description.japanese: アラスカの7つのベースジャンプスポットから飛び降りて安全に着陸する（DLCエクストリームパックが必要）
description.polish: Wyląduj bezpiecznie po skoku ze wszystkich 7 lokalizacji basejumpingowych na Alasce (wymagany dodatek „Pakiet ekstremalny”)
description.danish: Land sikkert efter at have sprunget ud fra alle syv basejump-steder i Alaska (kræver Extreme Pack-DLC)
description.dutch: Spring van alle 7 basejumpplekken in Alaska en land telkens veilig (DLC Extreme-pack vereist).
description.finnish: Hyppää kaikista Alaskan seitsemästä BASE-hyppypaikasta ja laskeudu turvallisesti (Extreme Pack -lisäosa vaaditaan)
description.norwegian: Land trygt etter å ha hoppet fra alle de 7 basehoppunktene i Alaska (Extreme Pack-nedlastingen kreves)
description.swedish: Landa säkert efter ett hopp från var och en av de 7 BASE-jumpplatserna i Alaska (DLC:t Extreme Pack krävs)
description.brazilian: Aterrisse com segurança após saltar de cada um dos 7 pontos de base jump do Alasca (DLC necessário: Pacote Extremo)
